sub_title: CEO at Author, Content writer, Selfpublisher
summary:
NEW PROJECTS:
1. A Childrens book (4-8 years) will be published by end of March 2015 in both English and Dutch and in all e-Formats. English title: Mike & Alex and Dutch title Puck & Evert. (11.000 words)
2. A short story (some 6000 words) also to be published by the end of March 2015 in both English and Dutch and in all e-Formats. English title: Friday 13th... and Dutch title Geluk volgt na vrijdag de 13e.
For both books is the selling price 99 cent (whether dollar or euro). They are published under the pseudonym Pete Van Kerk

I live very near the Dutch border, near Ootmarsum, Denekamp, Oldenzaal, Almelo

used to be reporter and chief economics desk Algemeen Dagblad at Rotterdam and Dutch local newspapers
Specialties: monetary economics and environment and energy (in particular technical)
Broadcasting
Espionage
Currently Author of books and stories / storyteller
Currently marketing my books Double Spy / Dubbel Spion / Spione Spione
Got 5 Star Reviews at Amazon

projects:
[{'title': 'Double Spy', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': "The joy to write about my experiences as a double agent during the Cold War. Me, not interested in military matters whatsoever, had to visit manouevres, meetings with high level generals. Got all kinds of materials. But the communists had no idea whatsoever about our free society, how to be safe there. That's the basic of the story in 188 pages. Reviews above all of my expectations.
The German book is named Spione Spione and counts 232 pages. 
The English book will be released in the second week of October 2013 and counts 155 pages.

Here a nice cartoon about Peter the Spy:
http://youtu.be/4p2F8I4JkxA
